channel.title: Living on the Veg
channel.desc: Henry Firth and Ian Theasby are the Bosh Brothers, the foodie double act wowing vegan food lovers with their video channel and their ground-breaking cookery books. Their mission is to get the nation eating delicious and simple dishes without meat or dairy - just plants.

channel.title: Escape to the Country
channel.desc: Ginny Buckley meets a couple of Londoners who have a massive ?1 million to spend on a detached property in the Essex countryside with lots of space for family and friends; Ginny visits a farmer who grows a crop usually found much further afield.
